name: Bluetoothchat
body: ##Android BluetoothChat =================================== ###Description Bluetooth Chat App is a chat service that should be run on two Android devices at the same time, to establish a two-way chat over Bluetooth between the devices. For a demo video [Click here] [2] [2]: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BP_ieotVcxw ##Screenshots ------------- ###Pre-requisites - Android 4.0 or higher - Android SDK v21 ###Why Use this App? - Send & receive messages (No Wi-Fi needed) - Save Contacts - Notifications feature - Help & Feedback option ###Steps: 1) Connect to a device 2) Chat Page 3) Save Chat/Contacts 1) Click on "Scan for devices" or click on the name of the previously connected device. ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ 2) Users can chat within the bluetooth range. The following screenshots portray an Android phone and an Android Tablet using the chat feature. ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ 3) Click on the "Menu" and click on "Settings" and click on "Contacts" ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ ##Getting Started --------------- This sample uses the Gradle build system. To build this project, use the "gradlew build" command or use "Import Project" in Android Studio. ##Support ------- - For FAQs [Click here] [1] [1]: https://github.com/NYIT-CSCI455-2015-Spring/BluetoothChat ##Coming Soon ------------- - Access camera and share pictures/videos - Save chat history - Chat with more than one person (Group chat) ##License ------- Copyright 2014 The Android Open Source Project, Inc.
